author: olegk
msg: HTTPCORE-319: Non-blocking SSLIOSession can fail to shut down correctly when the underlying connection gets terminated abnormally by the opposite endpoint in case there is a truncated or corrupted encrypted content in the input buffer and there is still data in the output buffer that needs to be flushed out (most likely to occur with POST or PUT requests)
